fields.summary: LiveView - Alloy - iOS: topbar rightNavButton disappears when applying changes if using models

comments.body:
Still reproducible

Environment:
 Titanium SDK .1.1.v20130613121914
 Appcelerator Studio 3.1.1.201306121633
 Code Processor 1.0.1-cr4
 Alloy 1.1.3-cr
 Node 0.8.22

Reopening.

Here's an example using the <RightNavButton> markup instead:

{code:xml}
<Alloy>
	<TabGroup>
		<Tab id='tab1' title='Tab 1'>
			<Window id='mainwin' title='main'>
                                <RightNavButton>
                                    <Button>button</Button>
                                </RightNavButton>
				<TableView id="tableView">
					<TableViewRow id="row">
						<Label class="rowTitle" text="pippo"/>
					</TableViewRow>
				</TableView>
			</Window>
		</Tab>
	</TabGroup>
</Alloy>
{code}

Verified fix with environment:

Appcelerator Studio: 3.2.0.201312171913
SDK: 3.2.0.v20131217190633
alloy: 1.3.0-cr2
acs: 1.0.10
npm: 1.3.2
titanium: 3.2.0-cr3
titanium-code-processor: 1.1.0-cr2
Liveview: 1.0.1
Mac OSX 10.9 Mavericks
Device: iPhone 5C(v7.0.4)

The topbar â€˜rightNavButton' does not disappears.Hence closing the issue.
